body_html: I'm getting build errors as well with TF 1.4.0 and CUDA 7.5, but it works with CUDA 8. Unfortunately I can't use CUDA 8 because of outdated Nvidia drivers that I can't upgrade, so it would be great if CUDA 7.5 were supported.
